title: Zalman CNPS20X and CNPS17X CPU Coolers Review - The NOCTUA Destroyers!?
description: Zalman is BACK with the CNPS20X and CNPS17X.  According to some reviews the CNPS20X can actually beat the Noctua NH-D15 while the CNPS17X will compete against the U14S and U12A.  Let's put these two brand new air coolers through our testing to see if they're the best CPU coolers of 2020.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Zalman CNPS20X:     Zalman CNPS17X:      Scythe Fuma 2:       Noctua NH-U14S:      Noctua NH-D15:    Noctua NH-U12A:      be quiet! Straight Power Platinum:       Full CPU Cooler Testing Methodology:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Zalman. This video is sponsored by be quiet!. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #cnps20x #cnps17x #hardwarecanucks
